definition: veganism, a diet consisting solely of plant products/strict vegetarianism
a vegan/person following a vegan diet

pinyin: zi4 you2 su4 shi2 zhu3 yi4

sentences.english: Amorphophallus Campanulatus Powder, Soya Bean Fibre, Starch, Vegetarian Seasoning.
sentences.chinese: 魔芋粉，大豆纤维，淀粉，素食调味料。

sentences.english: Are vegans really at greater risk of B12 deficiency?
sentences.chinese: 纯素食者患维生素B12缺乏症的风险真的很高吗？

sentences.english: Stearic Acid May be vegetarian or not.
sentences.chinese: 硬脂酸可能是素食主义者或没有。

sentences.english: Yes, Mike Tyson, a man who once chewed on human ear, is now vegan.
sentences.chinese: 是的，曾经咬人耳朵的拳手泰森现在是一个素食者了。

sentences.english: So is Pachauri right that going vegetarian can save the planet?
sentences.chinese: 那么，帕乔里提出的素食能拯救地球是否正确？

sentences.english: Da Vinci, Edison, Einstein, and Franklin were all vegetarians.
sentences.chinese: 不过一个共通点就是这些人都是素食主义者。

sentences.english: Does eating fruits and veggies make you more attractive?
sentences.chinese: 吃水果和素食真的能让你更迷人吗？

sentences.english: A brother initiate who is a skilled chef demonstrates vegetarian cooking . vegetarian stuffed cabbage.
sentences.chinese: 烹饪课上，厨师师兄示范美味素食餐点的料理方法。

sentences.english: Because of this, there have been claims that vegetarians are more at risk of iron-deficiency anaemia than non-vegetarians.
sentences.chinese: 因此，素食者比非素食都更容易患缺铁性贫血。

sentences.english: Because of this, there have been claims that vegetarians are more at risk of iron-deficiency anaemia than non-vegetarians.
sentences.chinese: 因此，素食者比非素食都更容易患缺铁性贫血。

sentences.english: But the cafeteria is doing its best to force me to be a vegetarian.
sentences.chinese: 但是饭堂竭力在强迫我成为一名素食主义者。

sentences.english: Today's vegetarian generations may frown upon canned luncheon meat.
sentences.chinese: 如今素食的一代人是不喜欢罐装的午餐肉的。

sentences.english: In addition many early nudists practiced vegetarianism and engaged in daily exercise.
sentences.chinese: 此外许多早期裸癖者奉行素食主义并忙于日常运动。

sentences.english: I mean that someday the population of vegetarian will more than the meat-eaters?
sentences.chinese: 我是说有没有可能未来素食的人口会多于肉食者呢？

sentences.english: Of course, proximity to great vegan restaurants was a bonus.
sentences.chinese: 有时往一家好的素食餐馆大吃一顿犒劳自己。

sentences.english: This religious group has considerably more vegetarians than the general population.
sentences.chinese: 这个宗教集团比普通群体有相当更多的素食者。

definition: a vegan/person following a vegan diet
veganism, a diet consisting solely of plant products/strict vegetarianism
